content: psl mitts just like their namesake these mitts are the epitome of basic and autumnal they are an excellent first step into the world of fingerless mitts for an advanced or adventurous beginner abbrevs k knit p purl st stitch dpn double-pointed needle k1tbl knit one through the back loop pm place marker sm slip marker m1l left-leaning increase m1r right-leaning increase note if you can t figure out the leaning increases just use whatever increase method you re comfortable with in their place mitts one size women s medium use fingering weight yarn less than half a skein and us 2 needles or size needed to get 28 st / 4 gauge
